price: Orang-orang Yahudi berkata, "Uzayr itu putra Allah" dan orang-orang Nasrani berkata, "Al-Masih itu putra Allah".  Demikian itulah ucapan mereka dengan mulut mereka, mereka meniru perkataan orang-orang kafir yang terdahulu.  Dilaknati Allah-lah mereka; bagaimana mereka sampai berpaling?
arabic: وَقَالَتِ ٱلۡيَهُودُ عُزَيۡرٌ ٱبۡنُ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالَتِ ٱلنَّصَٰرَى ٱلۡمَسِيحُ ٱبۡنُ ٱللَّهِۖ ذَٰلِكَ قَوۡلُهُم بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡۖ يُضَٰهِـُٔونَ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَبۡلُۚ قَٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ أَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālati al-yahūdu ʿuzayrun ub'nu al-lahi waqālati al-naṣārā al-masīḥu ub'nu al-lahi dhālika qawluhum bi-afwāhihim yuḍāhiūna qawla alladhīna kafarū min qablu qātalahumu al-lahu annā yu'fakūna
